title: CSP.guru
description: A database of concentrating solar power plants of the world for energy modellers and analysts.
long_description:
This datasets holds technical, economic, financial, and industrial data on all operating concentrating solar power stations and of stations under construction (larger than 10 MW). For detailed description of the data collection procedure, please see the original article [Lilliestam et al. (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1038/nenergy.2017.94).

## Data Package

We provide the data in form of a [tabular data package](https://frictionlessdata.io/specs/tabular-data-package/) that consists of a CSV (comma separated values) file holding the actual data and a single JSON file (`datapackage.json`) holding the metadata.

## License and conditions

The licence of this data allows use if you give appropriate credit, under the [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).

For academic and professional use (presentations, journal articles, reports, etc):
Please cite the original source, the paper [Lilliestam et al. (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1038/nenergy.2017.94). Please also link to https://www.csp.guru if possible.

## Contact

For questions or issues get in touch with [Johan Lilliestam](mailto:johan.lilliestam@usys.ethz.ch) or [Richard Thonig](mailto:richard.thonig@usys.ethz.ch).
## Acknowledgements
Funding for the 2016-08-30 version of this work came from a European Research Council Consolidator Grant [DESERTECTION (grant number 313553)](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/106709_de.html), versions 2018-05-14 and 2019-09-01 received support from the European Union Horizon 2020 research and innovation program [MUSTEC (grant agreement No 764626) ](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/211264_en.html) .

## Archive

All versions of the CSP.guru dataset are archived at [Zenodo](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1318151).

fields.name: Power_station
fields.description: name of the CSP plant

fields.name: Year_operational
fields.description: indicates the year of the first power output

fields.name: Status
fields.description: distinguishes if a CSP plant is operational or under construction

fields.name: Country
fields.description: country where the CSP plant is located

fields.name: City
fields.description: nearest city or municipality to the CSP plant site

fields.name: Lat
fields.description: latitude of the plant

fields.name: Lon
fields.description: longitude of the plant

fields.name: DNI_kWh_per_m2_per_yr
fields.description: direct normal irradiance (DNI) in kWh/m²/yr, indicates the solar resource

fields.name: Year_construction_start
fields.description: indicates the year when construction started

fields.name: Technology
fields.description: distinguishes CSP technologies: Trough, Tower, Hybrid, Fresnel

fields.name: Capacity_MW
fields.description: nominal capacity of the turbine  in MW

fields.name: Storage_capacity_h
fields.description: hours the turbine can run on full load using stored heat alone in hours

fields.name: Field_size_m2
fields.description: the mirror area ㎡

fields.name: Cooling
fields.description: cooling technology: dry, wet, or hybrid

fields.name: Expected_generation_GWh_per_yr
fields.description: expected yearly power output GWh per year

fields.name: Load_factor
fields.description: actual yearly generation divided by maximum possible yearly generation

fields.name: Cost_currency
fields.description: Indicates the currency used for total cost

fields.name: Total_cost_million_currency_non-deflated
fields.description: construction cost in million local currency, non-deflated

fields.name: Financed_through
fields.description: how the owner makes money from the generated electricity: power purchase agreement (PPA), feed-in tariff (FIT), spot market sales

fields.name: Support_currency
fields.description: Indicates the currency used for total cost

fields.name: Remuneration_currency_per_kWh
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in currency per kWh, local currency in the year financing was announced

fields.name: Remuneration_USD2018_per_kWh_deflated
fields.description: indicates the level of FIT or PPA in Euro2018 per kWh, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2017

fields.name: LCOE_5_25_USD2018_per_kWh
fields.description: levelised cost of electricity with 5% weighted average cost of capital USD2017/kWh and a 25 year payback period, cap dependent O&M, deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or constrution then deflated from 2018

fields.name: Concessional_funding-other_support
fields.description: financial assistance to project developer: tax credits, soft loans, etc.

fields.name: PPA_or_support_duration_yr
fields.description: duration of PPA, FIT, etc.in years

fields.name: Developer
fields.description: company that developed the project

fields.name: Developer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company that developed the project

fields.name: EPC
fields.description: company responsible for engineering, procurement and construction of the CSP plant

fields.name: EPC_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company responsible for engineering, procurement and construction of the CSP plant

fields.name: Receiver_manufacturer
fields.description: heat collecting element (HCE) manufacturer - for throughs or tower receiver

fields.name: Receiver_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the country of origin of the HCE manufacturer

fields.name: SCA_heliostat_engineering
fields.description: the company engineering the SCA or Heliostat and not the actual manufacturing; which is often subcontracted to local companies

fields.name: SCA_heliostat_engineering_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company engineering the solar collector assemblies (SCA) or Heliostats

fields.name: First_owner
fields.description: owner of the CSP plant when it was comissioned

fields.name: Sources
fields.description: indicates where the information on each plant was retrieved from, Lilliestam et al 2017: Nature energy; indicates the 2016-08-30 version of the CSP.guru dataset,
